desc: Best Solo Skiff Lift available. We offer the Skiff Lift transom saver for the solo skiff. Our Transom Saver skiff lift mounts to the solo skiff that increases the strength of the Solo Skiff Transom. This is why we are the best rated and top recommended solo skiff lift available.

layout.text:
We fabricate heavy duty aluminum transom savers specifically for the Solo Skiff.  We offer regular height transom savers and 2 inch lifted models. 
MADE IN TEXAS
